description: This easy sushi salad is light, colourful and a great lunchbox filler.
name: Edamame & Ginger Sushi Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pan of water to the boil, reduce the heat and cook the rice for 15 minutes. Add the edamame on top and cook for 5 more minutes until the water is absorbed. Remove the edamame from the pan with a spoon and set aside.
Whisk the soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, liquid from the pickled ginger and sesame oil together in a small bowl to make a dressing.
Divide the rice between 4 bowls, top with edamame, sliced avocado, spring onions, carrots and pickled ginger. Drizzle with dressing and serve.
